item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, April 24, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI releases image generation in the API (118 points | 55 comments)
2. One quantum transition makes light at 21 cm (163 points | 103 comments)
3. I wrote to the address in the GPLv2 license notice (2022) (489 points | 404 comments)

5. OpenVSX, which VSCode forks rely on for extensions, down for 24 hours (63 points | 13 comments)

14. Bild AI (YC W25) is hiring a founding engineer in SF ( | hide)

24. Careless People (693 points | 377 comments)

26. Show HN: My from-scratch OS kernel that runs DOOM (292 points | 73 comments)

29. YAGRI: You are gonna read it (302 points | 143 comments)
